Helen Walker

WotD6 - First

Aug 1, 2015

The word today is first, which got me to thinking about the starting point for doing good and interesting stuff.

Today's #PositivePostIt... The word for today is #first. There's a blog post too... Http://helenwalker.net/2015/08/01/wotd6-first

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Aug 1, 2015 at 5:50am PDT


Particularly when it comes to thinking about communication I talk a lot about intention. Whether it's about feedback, presentations, or writing a document, starting with a clear sense of purpose helps us get where we want to be, especially if our purpose is designed to benefit the recipient of the message.
